tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: He has excellent bedside etiquette, listens to the patient, understands the problem, discusses the management options and suggests appropriate  treatment options,  so the patient is involved right from the word "go". He has no  "GOD complex " issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Raghunandan is an amazing doctor whom I would highly recommend. My mother is 84 years old and can only converse in Hindi. Dr Raghunandan has carried out 2 cardiac procedures a few years ago and patiently listens to answers all my mother’s issues and concerns to
Her satisfaction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** *********** ** ************** not fussy, not given to over reaction, and definitely doesn't over-medicate. His treatment is macro, keeping in mind all possible markers related to your lifestyle, and health and fitness. He is approachable, accessible and communicative. It is very comforting to consult a doctor like him.

review: I have consulted cardiologist doctor Raghunandan B K for my mother. **** ****** ******** ** *** **** *** there is no value of times for doctor and also did not understand the importance of patient. Our waiting times are so long hours 3 hrs and after long waiting when we went doctor consultation room then he did not check up and not look into the report. One of the wasted our time behind this doctor I never recommend this doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I had taken my mother for hypertension treatment . He is one  of the best doctors  in prescribing the medicines .
Whatever the medicines he gives and if you go for the second opinion they retain the medicines prescribed by him. I am very happy with the doctor even my dad also had visited him long back . Even today Dr.Raghunandan is remembered  for giving the right medication . Thanks so much doctor.
